analysis.statement: Implement automated testing and validation of changes prior to deployment

checks.description: Verify Azure DevOps pipeline testing stages
checks.request: az pipelines build list --organization https://dev.azure.com/fedramp --project fedramp-project --query '[0:3].{Id:id, Status:status, Result:result, SourceBranch:sourceBranch}' --output json

checks.description: Verify ARM/Bicep template validation in CI/CD
checks.request: az deployment group validate --resource-group fedramp-staging-rg --template-file main.bicep --parameters @staging.parameters.json --query '{ProvisioningState:properties.provisioningState, Error:error}' --output json

checks.description: Verify container security scanning in build pipeline
checks.request: az acr task run --name security-scan-task --registry fedrampregistry --query '{Status:status, Platform:platform.os, StartTime:startTime}' --output json

checks.description: Verify automated testing procedures and gate policies
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify automated testing procedures, quality gates, and deployment approval policies
